official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enlarge the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate for addition to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site not more than 350 acres in the city of East Saint Louis, Illinois. Stipulates that lands owned by the State of Illinois or any political subdivision thereof may be acquired only by donation. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enlarge the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
